alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:48PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BRADFORD...EAST CENTRAL ALACHUA...WEST CENTRAL PUTNAM AND SOUTHWESTERN CLAY COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 447 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Geneva, or near Keystone Heights. A strong thunderstorm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Keystone Heights, Melrose, Lake Geneva, Hampton, and Putnam Hall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam
